data.title: New York Knicks Roster
data.meta_description: New York Knicks scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Carmelo Anthony was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Denver Nuggets on February 22, 2011.

Marcus Camby was acquired in a sign and trade by the New York Knicks from the Houston Rockets on July 11, 2012.

Tyson Chandler was acquired in a sign and trade by the New York Knicks from the Dallas Mavericks on December 10, 2011.

Raymond Felton was acquired in a sign and trade by the New York Knicks from the Portland Trail Blazers on July 15, 2012.

Amar'e Stoudemire was acquired in a sign and trade by the New York Knicks from the Phoenix Suns on July 8, 2010.

Earl Barron signed a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on April 17, 2013.

Chris Copeland signed a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on July 11, 2012.

Jason Kidd signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on July 12, 2012.

Kenyon Martin signed a contract with the New York Knicks on February 23, 2013. Kenyon Martin re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on March 5, 2013. Kenyon Martin re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on March 15, 2013.

Pablo Prigioni signed a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on July 17, 2012.

Quentin Richardson signed a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on April 16, 2013.

J.R. Smith signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks on February 17, 2012. J.R. Smith re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on July 11, 2012.

James White signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on July 10, 2012.
